Hello,

Is a tool out there, which generates suites for each package? Each
=
suite should contain all tests of its package and all suites of the
direct =
subpackages. Furthermore it should be able to update the
relevant suites, i=
f anywhere a new test was added.

I seek for such a tool, because i am goin=
g to intigrate TestCases one
by one to an existing large project. For now o=
nly a few tests exist,
but they are spread over all the packages. To be abl=
e to execute these
tests i want a root-suite which contains all existing te=
sts. But i
don=B4t want to write suites for each package by hand. 

Thanks =
in advance,

Helge
